articles.title: Arcade1Up isn’t dead, maybe - The Verge
articles.description: Toy company Basic Fun is acquiring “select assets” of Arcade1Up, according to a statement. Last week, a rumor surfaced that Arcade1Up would be “closing operations.”

articles.title: The Google app is intentionally replacing Pixel Launcher search - 9to5Google
articles.description: In the past few days, tapping the Pixel Launcher search bar opens a different screen powered by the Google app. This is not a bug...

articles.title: Alexa Plus’ website is live for some users - The Verge
articles.description: The website for Amazon’s AI-powered voice assistant previously redirected to an information page. For some users, it’s now more like an Alexa Plus web interface.

articles.title: Samsung’s 2026 Micro RGB LED TVs can actually fit in your living room - The Verge
articles.description: The new TVs will range in size from 55 to 100 inches, but pricing details are yet to be released.

articles.title: BG3 studio Larian says it's using genAI for Divinity, but not 'looking at trimming down teams to replace them' - Polygon
articles.description: Divinity, the next game from Baldur's Gate 3 devs Larian, employs AI and machine learning, but not at the expense of creators, Swen Vincke says.

articles.title: 4 Electronics You Should Only Buy From Amazon - bgr.com
articles.description: Consumers should buy smart TVs, Kindle devices, laptops, and Amazon Basics products from Amazon before any competitors, based on price and return policies.

articles.title: Meta’s AI glasses can now help you hear conversations better - TechCrunch

articles.title: Goblins and Gifts Galore in Goblin Greedings — Diablo IV - Blizzard News
articles.description: Goblin Greedings descends on Sanctuary as Treasure Goblin variants roam in increased numbers and bountiful spoils. Earn bonus Whisper Caches and claim free holiday cosmetics.

articles.title: Google wants its AI assistant CC to replace your morning scroll - The Verge
articles.description: Google’s AI agent CC is similar to OpenAI’s ChatGPT Pulse, delivering a personalized morning briefing based on your Gmail, Google Calendar, and Google Drive.

articles.title: Sony’s XM5 over-ear headphones are cheaper than ever — and they come with free wireless earbuds - The Verge
articles.description: Sony’s noise-canceling WH-1000XM5 headphones are currently at an all-time low price, and come with free wireless earbuds you can gift to someone for the holidays.
